presentationTable.name: Payroll Balances By Base Category
presentationTable.description: Provides pre-calculated balance value , along with balance values for certain base categories and base dimensions. As these are pre-calculated measures adding any base dimension and base category from Payroll balances dim will not make any difference in the values.

presentationColumns.name: Supplemental Earnings
presentationColumns.description: Balance Value - For base category 'Supplemental Earnings'
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - HCM - Payroll Run Balances.Supplemental Earnings
